articles.author: Midhat Fatimah
articles.title: Russia's Wagner Group leaves Mali, Africa Corps will stay - dw.com
articles.description: Russia's mercenary group Wagner said that it is leaving Mali after helping reestablish the Malian junta's control over regional centers.
articles.content:
The Russia-backedWagner Group of mercenaries on Friday said that it is leaving Mali after more than three and a half years of fighting Islamist insurgents in the country.
Despite the announcement by… [+1795 chars]
